body.raw:
{ "subject": "Payment Failure Notification", "body": "Payment Confirmation
Dear Eshwar,

Thank you for choosing Reliance Nippon Life Insurance.

We would like to confirm that we have received your premium amount of Rs. 1000 on 06-01-2024.

Click here to download the payment receipt.

Please keep your contact details updated with us to receive timely information about your policy.

Click here to view/update your details.

You can log in using your policy number, client id, or phone number.

For further queries, we request you to kindly reach out to us on the contact details mentioned below.

Assuring you of our best services, always.

Warm Regards,
Reliance Nippon Life Insurance.

Disclaimer: Reliance Nippon Life Insurance Company Limited. IRDAI Registration No: 121. Registered & Corporate Office: Unit Nos. 401B, 402, 403 & 404, 4th Floor, Inspire-BKC, G Block, BKC Main Road, Bandra Kurla Complex, Bandra East, Mumbai - 400051. India.

For more information or any grievance, you can:

  1. Call us between 8am to 8pm, Monday to Saturday (except public holidays) on our Toll Free Number 1800 102 1010.
  2. Visit us at www.reliancenipponlife.com.
  3. Email us at: rnlife.customerservice@relianceada.com.
  4. Chat with us on our WhatsApp number (+91) 7208852700.

Trade logo displayed above belongs to Anil Dhirubhai Ambani Ventures Private Limited & Nippon Life Insurance Company and is used by Reliance Nippon Life Insurance Company Limited under license. Beware of spurious phone calls and fictitious/fraudulent offers. IRDAI clarifies to the public that:

  • IRDAI or its officials do not involve in activities like sale of any kind of insurance or financial products nor invest premiums.
  • IRDAI does not announce any bonuses. Public receiving such phone calls are requested to lodge a police complaint along with details of phone call and number.

CIN: U66010MH2001PLC167089

For more information or any grievance, you can:

  1. Call us between 8am to 8pm, Monday to Saturday (except public holidays) on our Toll Free Number 1800 102 1010.
  2. Visit us at www.reliancenipponlife.com.
